## hpr3971 :: RERERE: How to make friends.

 RERERE: How to make friends.
We could make a series of this?


Source: hpr3904 ::
How to make friends

Source: hpr3942 ::
RE: How to make friends.

Source: Friendship

Source: Interpersonal
relationship

Source: Affection

Source: Blood
brother.

Source: Honour


If one's honour is questioned, it can thus be important to disprove
any false accusations or slander. In some cultures, the practice of
dueling arose as a means to settle such disputes firmly, though by
physical dominance in force or skill rather than by objective
consideration of evidence and facts.


Source: Ted Bundy


I thought this was funny: How to Ask a
Friend to Hang Out.
